languages.text: "Назракей. Архонт Черного сердца. Собственной персоной. Какая неожиданность". {n}Голос Маражая деланно спокоен, однако вы улавливаете нотки искреннего удивления, даже изумления — друкари очень, очень удивлен этой встрече.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Назракей". {n}Маражай в ярости оскаливается.{/n} "Собственной персоной. Что заставило архонта Черного сердца покинуть Темный город? Или гнев владыки, направленный на владения Опустошительной бури, задел и тебя?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Назракей. Архонт Черного сердца. Собственной персоной. Какая неожиданность". {n}Голос Маражая деланно спокоен, однако вы улавливаете нотки искреннего удивления, даже изумления — друкари очень, очень удивлен этой встрече.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart in the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. He is very, very astonished at this meeting.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart in the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. He is very, very astonished at this meeting.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nazrakhei. Archon des Schwarzen Herzens. Wie er leibt und lebt. Welch Überraschung." {n}Marazhais Stimme ist bewusst ruhig, doch du bemerkst auch einen Anflug von echter Überraschung, Verwunderung gar. Das ist das Letzte, womit er gerechnet hatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon des Schwarzen Herzens. Wie er leibt und lebt. Welch Überraschung." {n}Marazhais Stimme ist bewusst ruhig, doch du bemerkst auch einen Anflug von echter Überraschung, Verwunderung gar. Das ist das Letzte, womit er gerechnet hatte.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “纳札骸，黑心阴谋团的执政官。居然亲自出马了，真是让人惊喜。”{n}尽管玛拉斋故作镇定，但你能从他的声音里听出了发自内心的惊讶，甚至是惊喜。很显然，他根本没意料到会发生这样的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “纳札骸，黑心阴谋团的执政官。居然亲自出马了，真是让人惊喜。”{n}尽管玛拉斋故作镇定，但你能从他的声音里听出了发自内心的惊讶，甚至是惊喜。很显然，他根本没意料到会发生这样的事情。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nazrakhei. Archonte du Cœur Noir. En chair et en os. Quelle surprise... » {n}La voix de Marazhai se veut désabusée, mais vous décelez une pointe de surprise, voire d'étonnement. C'est la dernière personne qu'il s'attendait à voir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nazrakhei. Archonte du Cœur Noir. En chair et en os. Quelle surprise... » {n}La voix de Marazhai se veut désabusée, mais vous décelez une pointe de surprise, voire d'étonnement. C'est la dernière personne qu'il s'attendait à voir.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Nazrakhei. El Arconte del Corazón Negro. En persona. Vaya sorpresa». {n}La voz de Marazhai es deliberadamente tranquila, pero detectas una nota de auténtica sorpresa e incluso asombro. No se lo esperaba en absoluto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nazrakhei. El Arconte del Corazón Negro. En persona. Vaya sorpresa». {n}La voz de Marazhai es deliberadamente tranquila, pero detectas una nota de auténtica sorpresa e incluso asombro. No se lo esperaba en absoluto.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ナズラクヘイ。黒き心臓のアーコン。存在していたとは、なんたる驚きだ」{n}マラズハイの声は冷静を装っているが、その中に本当の驚きが、驚愕といってもいい感情が含まれているのに気づく。これは彼が予想だにしていなかったことなのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ナズラクヘイ。黒き心臓のアーコン。存在していたとは、なんたる驚きだ」{n}マラズハイの声は冷静を装っているが、その中に本当の驚きが、驚愕といってもいい感情が含まれているのに気づく。これは彼が予想だにしていなかったことなのだろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nazrakhei. Kara Yürek Arkonu. Bizzat karşımda. Bu ne büyük sürpriz." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi özellikle sakin çıksa da sözlerinde samimi bir şaşkınlık, hatta hayret seziyorsun. Bunu gerçekten beklemiyormuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei. Archon of the Black Heart. In the flesh. What a surprise." {n}Marazhai's voice is deliberately calm, but you catch a note of genuine surprise, even amazement. This is the last thing he was expecting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei. Kara Yürek Arkonu. Bizzat kendisi. Bu ne büyük sürpriz." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi özellikle sakin ancak bu seste samimi bir şaşkınlık, hatta hayret sezebiliyorsun. Bunu gerçekten beklemiyormuş.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
